content.p: Here are some of the preparations you may need to make after receiving an offer to study with us at Nottingham as an international or EU student. When you're getting ready to join us and making your final preparations for study, check our welcome webpages for checklists of things to do before and after you arrive, plus extra guidance for international and EU students on travel, money, health services, our International Welcome Programme, late arrival and more. Start your journey How to apply Fees and funding
